subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With Monday’s loss to the Washington Nationals, the Mets have lost 20 of their past 24 games at Citi Field, where they are 30-39 over all this season.
snippet: With Monday’s loss to the Washington Nationals, the Mets have lost 20 of their past 24 games at Citi Field, where they are 30-39 over all this season.
